metadata.name: HUNT Building #1
metadata.description:
Hunt Town: Hunt Town is a Web3 builders guild where builders come together to contribute to the expansion of Web3 culture and products.

Building NFT: Minting of 1 HUNT Building NFT requires 1,000 HUNT tokens to be locked-up for one year. After this lock-up period, the NFT holder can burn his/her Building NFT and the 1,000 HUNT tokens will be returned to the person.

To have full access to the Hunt Town Discord and earn BUILD points, you need at least 1 Building NFT and to become verified via the Discord server.

About Hunt Town: https://hunt.town
